column6:
"UP IS DOWN AND BLACK IS WHITE",2005,5
Frank Castle's got big problems: Ubergangster Nicky Cavella is back with a vengeance. And if Frank is going to survive the experience he just might need a little help...from a secret admirer. Part 3 (of 6).
32 PGS./Parental Advisory ...$2.99
